name: Marble It Up!
detailed_description:
Get Ready to Roll!

From the developers that brought you the Marble Blast series comes Marble It Up! - the joyful, bouncing, beautiful game you’ve been waiting for. Roll, jump, and master the custom-built marble physics to make your way through dozens of breathtaking levels! Experience first-hand the simple joy of rolling while exploring a gloriously psychedelic world full of mind-bending levels and dynamic power-ups. Racing to the finish line is an accomplishment at all levels of play - and with leaderboards, replays, ghost races, and rewards to help you push your skills to the next level, you’ll be a master in no time!




Marble It Up! on Steam also comes with a robust Level Editor. Through Steam Workshop integration, you can create, upload, and share your incredible marble maps! Your creation could even end up being featured in a “best-of-the-best” curated community map chapter!

So, whether you’ve been rolling marbles for the last decade or have never even seen a marble before (which we find hard to believe) - there’s never been a better time to pick up, play, and Marble It Up!

The next generation of marble rolling game has arrived.

Features

  • Roll, bounce, and boost your way to the finish line across 40 visually striking maps!
  • Runs beautifully at 60fps
  • Unlock majestic marble skins!
  • Race against your own and your friends’ times in Ghost Mode!
  • Watch replays from the global and friends Leaderboards (and learn from the best!)
  • Use exciting power-ups to slow time, launch into the air, and glide your way to glory!
  • Test your skills and smarts in an incredibly varied set of kinetic platforming puzzles!
  • Create, share, and play custom maps through the Steam Workshop!

short_description: Roll, bounce, and boost your way from skillful start to frame-perfect finish in Marble It Up! - the next generation of marble-rolling platformer. Chase the records of your friends and the world's best players through intricate, beautiful, mind-bending levels… Get Ready to Marble It Up!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain
reviews:
“Marble It Up! is an incredible game featuring tight controls, solid physics, and engaging levels.”
VG Culture

“A must-buy for anyone who loved Marble Blast Ultra on the Xbox 360.”
Game Over

“Marble It Up! is the marble-based momentum puzzler I've been craving for a decade.”
PC Gamer

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 (64-bit)
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz Dual core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 630 or Iris Pro Graphics
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: 2.5+ GHz Quad core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 760
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS Sierra
  • Processor: 1.2GHz Intel Core m3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel UHD Graphics 630
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS Mojave
  • Processor: 1.3GHz Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon Pro 560
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
